name: Our Lovely Ladyverse
description:
Do you ever feel like we're all just teetering on the edge? Stood there grinding the cooper casings of our teeth down to their lead cores in collective anxiety?

Thank god for women, huh? Let's go kiss our wife.

This is a short piece of fiction I wrote for no specific reason if you like it thank you and if not well, it's free right?

Featuring artwork by Mia Cain!

Built using Videotome by Freya C (quote, "an engagingly bleak game")!

Content Warnings

Kind of depressing at points. War talk. War crimes. Anxiety about the future and [these uncertain times]. Unpleasent English and French xenophobia.
